issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.21 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #d94a38, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.21 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #d94a38, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.21:1. Recommendation:  change background to #d34432.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.21:1. Recommendation:  change background to #d34432.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > main > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(5) > h3

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.21 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #d94a38, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

relatedNodes.html: Charlotte Culture Guide is a project of ASC.

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.54:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #7c4dff, surrounding text: #555555)

relatedNodes.html: Charlotte Culture Guide is a project of ASC.

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.54:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #7c4dff, surrounding text: #555555)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

issues.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.54:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #7c4dff, surrounding text: #555555)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

relatedNode.nodeLabel: Charlotte Culture Guide is a project of ASC.

issues.title: Anchor element found with a valid href attribute, but no link content has been supplied.

original_issue.message: Anchor element found with a valid href attribute, but no link content has been supplied.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > footer > div:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(1)

issues.title: Anchor element found with a valid href attribute, but no link content has been supplied.

original_issue.message: Anchor element found with a valid href attribute, but no link content has been supplied.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > footer > div:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(2)

issues.title: Anchor element found with a valid href attribute, but no link content has been supplied.

original_issue.message: Anchor element found with a valid href attribute, but no link content has been supplied.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > footer > div:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(3)

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (134.5px by 15px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 22.8px instead of at least 24px.
